mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.SRVC_NM , a.METHOD_NM , a.PROCESS_SE_CODE , CASE a.PROCESS_SE_CODE WHEN 'S' THEN '조회' WHEN 'I' THEN '입력' WHEN 'U' THEN '업데이트' WHEN 'D' THEN '삭제' END PROCESS_SE_CODE_TXT , a.PROCESS_TIME , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.EMP_NM , a.SQL_PARAM , a.METHOD_RESULT , TO_CHAR(a.OCCRRNC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') OCCRRNC_DATE , a.ERROR_SE , a.ERROR_CODE FROM COMTNSYSLOG a, VW_EMPINFO b WHERE a.RQESTER_ID = b.ADMIN_ID AND a.REQUST_ID = #{requstId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTSSYSLOGSUMMARY SELECT TO_CHAR(b.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') as OCCRRNC_DE , 'Member-login' as SRVC_NM , 'actionLogin' as METHOD_NM , SUM(CASE WHEN b.CONECT_MTHD = 'I' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CREAT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.CONECT_MTHD = 'U' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UPDT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.CONECT_MTHD = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RDCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN b.CONECT_MTHD = 'O' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DELETE_CO , 0 AS OUTPT_CO , 0 AS ERROR_CO FROM LETTNLOGINLOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT c.OCCRRNC_DE FROM LETTSSYSLOGSUMMARY c WHERE TRIM(c.OCCRRNC_DE) = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE -1 ), 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND TO_CHAR(b.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE -1 ), 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') , b.CONECT_MTHD
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LETTNLOGINLOG WHERE TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE -210 ), 'YYYYMMDD')
